SENTENCE.STRING: (Arabic: نواكشوط or انواكشوط [alleged translation from berberic "The place of the winds"] Nawākšūṭ) is the capital and by far the largest city of Mauritania, and
is Sahara's largest city if one excludes marginal cases like Cairo (in the Nile River Delta) and the cities north of the Atlas Mountains on Africa's northern coast.
is the administrative and economic centre of Mauritania.
